reviews.review_msg: Best prof ever. I had him for Osteology, realized how awesome he was and took 3 other courses with him. I felt that he could be tough but fair. He was extremely helpful with projects if he could tell you took an interest with him as well. I genuinely enjoyed showing up to his classes to hear his jokes and anecdotes. I'm sad to see that he's gone!

Fantastic teacher. Yes, he does tend to drone on at lengths. However, I often enjoyed his comments. He's very intelligent and he treats you as an equal. He was always willing to lend a hand if needed. He seems to genuinely care about his students as well (although he seems to forget names quite easily).
Awesome teacher. Can be a bit confusing at times but he is charismatic and a pleasure to have as a teacher!

well, Hugo. I have to give you a solid B for being an OK prof this term. For those of you who is taking this course, make sure you have a good partner for the project. I was solid A up untill the project. My partner refused to do her part and I suffered 2 grades bc of her poor performance. Otherwise, Hugo is fair, extremely thorough and critical.
Overall good guy, who expects students to do well, but does not spoon feed.

Downright exceptional prof. Very knowledgable. Encourages participation and questions. Tough marker, but is clear about what he wants and delivers useful feedback. Lectures are long but very informative.
Catherine is fabulous! She is brilliant, and driven and very devoted to her work.  I agree that exams are hard, but fair.  She appreciates creative/intelligent paper topics.  Take Egypt/Africa!

She is very knowledgeable in the field and she would always tell us stories about her fieldwork! She has done a a lot of cases and can always give us useful examples to apply the things we're learning in class!

I've had Ana for two classes and I find her extremely knowledgable and friendly. She won't approach you, but she is more than willing to help or have a conversation if you go to her. Her quizzes are never easy, but it is a necessity of the course (forensic anth) to be familiar with everything. She is absolutely tough, but fair.
very unhelpful and extremely unapproachable. Makes quizzes to "trick you" not to test your knowledge. Assignments are always unclear, as are deadlines. Expensive textbook is virtually useless.
Might be my favourite class at university so far. If you can take a class with her do it!
